channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Pearly Drops Announce New Album The Voices Are Coming Back: Hear “Ratgirl”
item.description: 🎉 Pearly Drops are back with "Ratgirl" from their upcoming album! 🐀🎶 Who's ready for this musical masterpiece? #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Panopticon Announce Folk Album Laurentian Blue And Black Metal Album Songs Of Hiraeth
item.description: 🎶 Double the vibes, double the excitement! Panopticon is blessing us with a new folk and black metal album! 🤘💙 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Bruce Springsteen Pays Tribute to Brian Wilson: “Most Musically Inventive Voice in All of Pop”
item.description: Rock 'n roll legends unite! 🎸 Bruce Springsteen hails Brian Wilson as the ultimate pop maestro. 🌟 What a harmonious tribute! 🎶 #MusicLegends #PopIcons

item.title: Billie Joe Armstrong Honors Brian Wilson With Sizzling Cover of the Beach Boys’ ‘I Get Around’
item.description: Billie Joe Armstrong brings the 🔥 with a killer cover of The Beach Boys' 'I Get Around' 🏄‍♂️🎸 #RockLegendsUnite

item.title: Yeah Yeah Yeahs begin intimate theater tour with live debuts, deep cuts, Björk cover & more (video, setlist)
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the magic with Yeah Yeah Yeahs on their new tour! Live debuts, deep cuts, and a Björk cover - pure musical bliss! 🎤 #YeahYeahYeahs #TourTime
